406b.text: RECALL and SHUFFLE are basic features of any room with cards. But SHUFFLE has expanded uses with any other widget type and for widgets outside of holders.

bm4j.text: A Recall and Shuffle button is included with every standard deck of cards widget. The button recalls all cards in the deck that is in that holder.  Recall only works on decks. The button then flips the cards face down and finally performs a shuffle. Shuffling the widgets in a holder randomizes their stacking order ('z' position).

bm5j.text: Holders can contain more than one deck. The holder above contains 2 standard decks and RECALL will recall them all and mix the decks. Recall also offers an 'owned' parameter. It is true by default. If set to false, it will not recall cards that have an 'owner' property set (typically those in a player's hand). Test that by moving some cards from the deck above into the hand below and pressing the button.

bm6j.text: SHUFFLE can be used on holders that contain widgets other than cards. The holder above has 8 checkers with a vertical stackOffset so you can see what is happening. The checker closest to the top of the screen has a 'z' value of 1 and the others have 'z' in ascending order. Press the button and the widgets are shuffled. No x,y movement is taking place. The only change is to randomize 'z'.

bm7j.text: SHUFFLE also works on widgets outside of holders. The button above gathers the assortment of widgets into a collection. The items are sorted by 'z' value, which you can see if you stack them on top of each other. The id's from lowest to highest z are then displayed in the text area below the items.

clickRoutine.note: Because the GET function always collects id's based on the order in which they appear in the tree list in JSON, the sort is needed to correlate the id to the z value.

bm8j.text: Recall buttons can also exclude cards in a collection. If the 'excludeCollection' paramter is present and is a valid collection, cards in the collection will not be recalled. For example, the button above excludes all face cards from the recall of the deck on the far left. Drag the entire pile into the hand and press the button above to see that demonstrated.
